brahmā yena kulālavaṃ niyamito brahmāṃḍabhāṃḍodare viṣṇur yena daśāva-
-tāragahane kṣiptaḥ sadā śaṃkare | rudro yena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nitya-
-m eva gagane tasmai namaḥ karmaṇe || 1 asti ujjayanī nāma nagarī | tatra mahāseno nāma rājā | tasya devaśa-
-rmā nāma brāhmaṇaḥ | tasya putro guṇakaro nāma | yat kim api gṛhe tiṣṭati tat sarvaṃ dyūtena hārayati | kuṭaṃbe-
seno nāma rājā | -na militvā nirvvāṭitaḥ | gataḥ saḥ anyadeśe śūnyadevakule upaviṣṭaḥ | tatra tena yogī dṛṣṭaḥ
gatvā namaskāraḥ kṛtaḥ | yoginoktaṃ | yas tvaṃ | tenoktaṃ bubhukṣito 'haṃ brāhmaṇaḥ | kapālodanaṃ gṛhītvā bhuṃkṣva | te-
-noktaṃ | kapālasthaṃ bhojanaṃ na karoti | ciṃtitaṃ yoginā | dhyānena smṛtā vidyā samāyātā _ yakṣiṇī
bhagavan ādeśo dīyatāṃ | bhaṇitaṃ yoginā | asya brāhmaṇasya bhavyaṃ bhojanaṃ dātavyaṃ | iti śrutvā yakṣiṇyā ra-
-citaṃ divyabhojanaṃ tatra brāhmaṇaṃ nītvā divyabhojanaṃ vilāsavilepaṃ tāṃbūlasuṣmādibhiḥ sukhaśayyāyāṃ rā-
-trau tena brāhmaṇena saha krīḍitā prabhātasamaye yakṣiṇī gatā | sa brāhmaṇaḥ ekākī saṃjātaḥ | tena yogi-
-nā bhaṇitaṃ brāhmaṇa kim udvignacittaḥ brāhmaṇenoktaṃ | yakṣiṇyā viyogena mariṣyāmi | yominagino-
-noktaṃ sā devī vidyābalena āgachati | tenoktaṃ | prabho mama vidyāṃ kathaya | ahaṃ sādhayiṣyāmi | yoginoktaṃ
idaṃ maṃtraṃ gṛhītvā jalamadhye sthitvā ekacitto bhūtvā sādhaya | gato sau jalamadhye | tena maṃtraḥ sādhitaḥ | sarvaṃ mayāmayaṃ
dṛṣṭaṃ nisṛto jalamadhyāt kathita saṃyogino māyāvisūraṃ bhaṇitaṃ yoginā agnipraveśaṃ kuru | tena guṇākareno-
-ktaṃ | kuṭaṃbasya militvā samāgamiṣyāmi | paścāt agni sādhayiṣyāmi | evaṃ bhaṇitvā gataḥ | kuṭaṃbasya pārśve sarvaiḥ
kaṃṭhe lagitvā rodayitum ārabdhaṃ | pitroktaṃ | vatsa guṇākara etāvaṃti divasāni kutaḥ sthitaḥ kathaṃ gṛhaṃ vismṛ-
-taṃ |
pativratā dharmaśīlā sadācārakriyānvitā | tasyāś ca varjanāt putra | bhrūṇahatyānvito bhavet |
na gārha-
-sthāt paro dharmo na sukhaṃ gṛhiṇīparaṃ | na tīrthaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyo na devaḥ keśavāt paraḥ |
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva ye
niṃdaṃti narādhamāḥ | na teṣām ūrdhvagamaṃnam evam āha prajāpatiḥ |
kāmārttāṃ ya striyāṃ dīnāṃ prārthayaṃtī punaḥ punaḥ
bhajamānāṃ na bhuṃjīta taṃ vai cāṃḍāladarśanaṃ | putra uvāca |
amedhyapūrṇe kṛmijālasaṃkule svabhāvadurgraṃdhinim a-
-śaucipūrite | kalevare mūtrapurīṣabhājane ramaṃti mūrkhā viramaṃti paṃḍitāḥ |
kasya mātā pitā kasya bhāryā ka-
-sya suto pi vā | jāto jāto hi jīvānāṃ bhavaṃty eva pare pare |
mṛtaś cāhaṃ punar jāto jātaś cāhaṃ punar mṛtaḥ | nānāyo-
-nisahasrāṇi mayā dṛṣṭā nināya te |
śukraśoṇitasaṃyogād dehaḥ saṃjāyate punaḥ | nitya miṇmūtrapū-
-rṇaś ca tenāyam aśuciḥ smṛtaḥ |
yathātarviṣṭayā pūrṇaḥ śuciḥ syān na bahir ghaṭaḥ | yan na śodhyamāno yaṃ deho ya- 19
-m aśuciḥ smṛtaḥ |
dehaḥ saṃśodhyamāno pi paṃcagavyakuśāṃbubhiḥ | ghṛṇyamāṇa ivāṃgāro nirmalatvaṃ na gachati | śrotriya-
-sya satataṃ pravahaṃti girir iva | kaṣamūtrapurīṣādyaiḥ sadehaḥ śudhyate kathaṃ |
agnau kriyāvatī devo divi devo
manīṣiṇāṃ | pratimā tulyabuddhīnāṃ yogināṃ hṛdaye hariḥ |mayā yogaśāstram abhyasitaṃ | nāhaṃ gṛhāśramaṃ ka-
-riṣyāmi | vidyābalena saṃsāre punar āgamanaṃ chetsyāmi | evaṃ kathayitvā svagṛhān niḥsṛtaḥ | yatra yogī tiṣṭa-
-ti tatra samāyātaḥ | yoginaḥ pārśve āgatya prajvalito gnirmadhye praviṣṭaḥ smaritā vidyā | sā yakṣiṇī na samāyātā |
kathitaṃ yoginā nāgatā vidyā | iti kathānakaṃ kathayitvā vaitālenoktaṃ | rājan kathaya kena kāraṇena vaṭayakṣi-
-ṇī na samāyātā | rājñoktaṃ | sādhakasya cittaṃ bhaṇitvā nāgatā devī |
ekacitto lābhayet siddhi dvidhācitto vina-
-syati |
tyāgena hīnasya kuto sti kīrtiḥ satyena hīnasya kuto sti pūjā | nyāyena hīnasya kuto sti lakṣmī dhyāne-
-na hīnasya kuto sti siddhiḥ | vetālenoktaṃ | kathaṃ sādhako dvidhācittaḥ | rājñoktaṃ | maṃtraṃ sādhayitvā kuṭaṃbapārśve gataḥ |
yogino pi īdṛśasya dvidhācittasya chātrasya kathaṃ vidyā dattā | anena kāraṇena nāgatā | kupitā tasyopari |
kiṃ ka-
-roti naraḥ prājñaḥ preryamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ | prāg eva hi manuṣyāṇāṃ buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī | evaṃ śrutvā vetālo gataḥ | sapta-
-daśyakaṃ kathānakaṃ samāptaṃ || 17
